title: I got pema ban but why?
body:
I tryed to logged in this morning (26 june) and it says that my account is perma ban and i'd like to know how and why?

Thanks for the answer

replies.body: And can i know if the skin i bought and gift to my friend will stay when i'll pay will i keep them or no?

But the thing is i never buy or ask someone to get those Rp. I was playing with my friend and him and me receive for 100$.
So why do i have to pay something that i never asked or even Buy!

It looks like a chargeback was issued on one of the transactions this account made, so the money was returned and the account is locked until it's been repaid. Read up on how [**chargebacks **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334)are handled, and you can reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for more context if you need!
